ISSUECARDS.name: Dispatch Probe
ISSUECARDS.description: The radar intercepts some strange signals, send out a probe to check on it.

ISSUECARDS.name: Distress Signal
ISSUECARDS.description: You intercept a signal from space. Spend ome time decoding it.

ISSUECARDS.name: Earth Transmission
ISSUECARDS.description: There's a message from Earth, reply and update them on your progress.

ISSUECARDS.name: External Communications Issue
ISSUECARDS.description: You can't communicate with home, fix the issue before it's too late!

ISSUECARDS.name: Good Communication!
ISSUECARDS.description: Discard this card next turn. All players receive an extra roll, keep your highest roll.

ISSUECARDS.name: Internal Comms Issue
ISSUECARDS.description: The onboard communications are down, fix it immediately!.

ISSUECARDS.name: Air Leak
ISSUECARDS.description: A piece of rock has collided with the ship and air is leaking. Patch it up!.

ISSUECARDS.name: Broken Air Filter
ISSUECARDS.description: Carbon dioxide is reaching critical level! Replace the air flter.

ISSUECARDS.name: Engine Malfunction
ISSUECARDS.description: The engines are going haywire! if this issue isn't solved in two turns, the ship will move back a space.

ISSUECARDS.name: Faulty Generator
ISSUECARDS.description: The generator is struggling and making ensettling sounds. Fix it!

ISSUECARDS.name: Item Boost
ISSUECARDS.description: All items action points are doubled this turn. Discard this card next turn.

ISSUECARDS.name: Lighting Malfunction
ISSUECARDS.description: The lighting system is flickering, fix it.

ISSUECARDS.name: Flu Outbreak
ISSUECARDS.description: A nasty unidentified illness is spreading among the crew. Contain It.

ISSUECARDS.name: Hallucinating
ISSUECARDS.description: One of your crew begins experiencing hallucinations, treat them immediately.

ISSUECARDS.name: Healthy Crew
ISSUECARDS.description: Your crew is healthy! All actions require -3 points this turn. This will be discard next turn.

ISSUECARDS.name: Isolation
ISSUECARDS.description: One of your team is feeling isolated. Treat them as soon as possible.

ISSUECARDS.name: Paranoia
ISSUECARDS.description: One of your crew is suffering from paranoia, treat them as soon as you can.

ISSUECARDS.name: Space Pregnancy
ISSUECARDS.description: One of the crew is having a baby, deliver the first space baby!

ISSUECARDS.name: Backpack Extended
ISSUECARDS.description: All players can carry an extra item from now onwards (5 items max). Discard card a card next go.

ISSUECARDS.name: Broken Items
ISSUECARDS.description: All items are disabled this turn. Discared next turn.

ISSUECARDS.name: Chicken on Board
ISSUECARDS.description: one member cant play while catching the chicken.

ISSUECARDS.name: Gravity Leak!
ISSUECARDS.description: There's a gravity leak, all issues require +3 points this turn. Discarded next turn.

ISSUECARDS.name: Items Overused
ISSUECARDS.description: All items are overused and the value of items depreciates by 3 this turn. Discarded next turn.

ISSUECARDS.name: Low Resources!
ISSUECARDS.description: Everyone returns all their items to the bottom of the deck. Discarded next turn.

ISSUECARDS.name: Asteroid Field
ISSUECARDS.description: You're entering an asteroid belt. Navigate through carefully!

ISSUECARDS.name: Black Hole
ISSUECARDS.description: Pilot rolls a dice! Get less than a 4, your ship moves bcak a space!

ISSUECARDS.name: Bonus Movement!
ISSUECARDS.description: Pilot rolls a dice! This card will be discard next turn! Your roll is 1/2'ed and moves your ship that many spaces!

ISSUECARDS.name: Flight Route Updated
ISSUECARDS.description: Your planned flight path has changed and you need to update the on-board systems.

ISSUECARDS.name: Navigation Error
ISSUECARDS.description: Theere is a stange noise coming from the navigation system, correct it!

ISSUECARDS.name: Space Pirates
ISSUECARDS.description: You're flying next to an alien pirate hot spot! Make sure you avoid them!

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Big Issue
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Help solving a 15 point issue before drawing a new card!
OBJECTIVECARDS.ability: All ship movement is free for a turn.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Class Items
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Acquire two different class items before drawing a new card.
OBJECTIVECARDS.ability: Swap out all item cards for new ones.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Class Solver
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Solve an issue not assigned to your class before drawing a new card.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Issue Helper
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Assist with one issue before drawing a new card.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Big Issue Helper
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Help solve a 15 point issue before drawing a new card..
OBJECTIVECARDS.ability: Trade this card in to solve an issue immediately.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Issue Solver Medium
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Solve a 10 point issue solo before drawing a new card.
OBJECTIVECARDS.ability: All ship movement is free for a turn.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Issue Solver Large
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Solve a 15 point issue solo before drawing a new card.
OBJECTIVECARDS.ability: The ship will move forawrd an extra space.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Issue Solver Small
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Solve a 5 point issue solo before drawing a new card.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Majority Helper
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Put the most points towards an issue card to solve it.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Personal Issue
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Solve an issue assigned to your class before drawing a new card.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: point Stash
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Use none of your action points for one turn.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Unhelpful
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Don't help the player to your right solve an issue.

OBJECTIVECARDS.name: Unhelpful
OBJECTIVECARDS.description: Don't help the player to your left solve an issue.
OBJECTIVECARDS.ability: Re-roll the dice at any point during your turn.
